title: Hatfield and the North - 1st Album 1974 / Expanded

Personnel / Hatfield and the North:

Phil Miller - guitars

Pip Pyle - drums

Richard Sinclair - bass, vocals

Dave Stewart - organ, piano

with The Northettes:

Barbara Gaskin - backing vocals

Amanda Parsons - backing vocals

Ann Rosenthal - backing vocals

and

Robert Wyatt - vocals (track 4)

Jeremy Baines Ã¢â‚¬â€œ pixiephone

Geoff Leigh - saxophones, flute



Hatfield and the North / Hatfield and the North / 1973


Note: The name of the band was inspired by the road signage on the main A1 road heading north from London, where a succession of signs referred to the first major town, and the overall direction, as 'A1 Hatfield & the North'.
